it.polimi.ingsw.controller - package it.polimi.ingsw.controller
Contains all the classes that control the flow of a game and modify the model using inputs received from the views (in an MVC architectural pattern)
it.polimi.ingsw.model - package it.polimi.ingsw.model
Contains all the necessary to define the sate of a Game (in an MVC architectural pattern)
it.polimi.ingsw.model.command - package it.polimi.ingsw.model.command
Contains all the commands classes, the Command pattern is a behavioral design pattern.
it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerstate - package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerstate
Contains all the possibles states of a player during a match.
it.polimi.ingsw.network - package it.polimi.ingsw.network
Contains classes used to communicate between server and clients with RMI and Sockets using a common Protocol
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client - package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client
Contains classes used by a client to communicate with a server using RMI or Sockets.
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server - package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server
Contains classes used to setup a Server that accepts both RMI and Sockets clients.
it.polimi.ingsw.utils - package it.polimi.ingsw.utils
Contains utilities classes for various purpose
it.polimi.ingsw.view - package it.polimi.ingsw.view
Contains classes used to show the game to the client whatever interface is used (CLI or GUI)
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli - package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli
Contains classes related to the CLI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.commandmessage - package it.polimi.ingsw.view.commandmessage
Contains classes used to represent the command messages
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui - package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Contains classes related to the GUI built using JavaFX
